items.summary: Create a new scheduling page accessible from the main navigation with a form allowing customers to request service appointments. The form should include fields for customer name, phone number, email, service address, preferred date, preferred time window (morning/afternoon/evening), service type dropdown (matching the six services: Sprinkler Repair, Sprinkler Installation, Spring Startup, Winterization, Leak Detection, System Upgrades), and additional notes. Include form validation and a submit button that displays a confirmation message upon submission.
Add a 'Schedule Service' link to the header navigation menu between 'Contact' and the phone number, routing to the new scheduling page at /schedule

Replace all instances of the R Irrigation logo throughout the site (in the Header component and anywhere else it appears) with the user-provided logo image file 9962DF11-5A7E-4582-A58F-DBC7D2FE64A8.png, maintaining appropriate sizing and responsive behavior

Add prominent 'Schedule Service' call-to-action buttons on the homepage HeroSection (alongside existing Call Now and Request Free Estimate buttons) and in the CTABlock component to drive traffic to the new scheduling page
